metadata.Title: CVE-2022-30784 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
A crafted NTFS image can cause heap exhaustion in ntfs_get_attribute_valuein NTFS-3G through 2021.8.22.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-30784` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libntfs-3g89 - 1:2021.8.22-3ubuntu1.1
ntfs-3g - 1:2021.8.22-3ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ntfs-3g package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:2021.8.22-3ubuntu1.1').
